settings.heading_1: Luxury Gifts: A Guide to Luxury Present Ideas
settings.description_1: We're making a conscious effort to shop sustainably and uplift the incredible women who create and innovate. To make your holiday gifting truly special, we've handpicked a selection of gifts from female founders and women-owned brands. These thoughtful presents are sure to bring joy to everyone on your list.

settings.gift_description: Femmes Sans Peur is a woman owned and operated business with a whole lot of heart. Founder & Creative Director, Christina Jean Durante created the brand after a slip in designer shoes left her with a trip to the hospital. Adored by A-listers and fabulous women globally, FSP truly speaks to women. For the rebels, the dreamers and the confidence seekers, FSP has redefined footwear offering bold luxury shoe designs that allow women to express their personal style without sacrificing comfort for fashion, and feel empowered with every step!

Head turning light-weight knitwear that's ready for a vacation when you are. Ambra Maddalena's summer-ready dresses are an ode to summer. Light-weight and crinkle free, these dresses are perfect for vacation packing. Our extensive range of styles and colours means you can wear the rainbow all summer long while our super stretchy fabrication hugs your form, any which way she flows.
